column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ okoduaa eburow kwa mu ahomgyeda
column3: na n'esuafo no pempaan eburow mbɛtsem no bi posae wɔ hɔn nsamu wee."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no mu binom see dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom reyɛ dza ɔmmfa kwan mu dɛ wɔyɛ no ahomgyeda yi?"

column2: "Na Jesus buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom nnkenkaan iyi mpo
column4: dza David
column5: aber a ɔkɔm dzee ɔnoara na hɔn a wɔka no ho no

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔkɛhɛɛn Nyankopɔn fie
column3: na ɔkɛfaa kyerɛpaanoo no dzii
column4: na ɔmaa hɔn a wɔka no ho no so bi wɔ ber a ɔmmfa mbra mu dɛ obiara dzi gyedɛ asɔfo no nkotsee no?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Nyimpa Ba no yɛ ahomgyeda no no wura."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ahomgyeda kor bi so mu
column3: ɔkɔr nhyiamudan mu kɛkyerɛkyerɛe; na nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa nyimfa adwe."

column2: "Na akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo no tsɛɛw no dɛ ɔbɛyɛ edur ahomgyeda no
column3: ama woeenya biribi akɔtoa no."

column2: "Na ɔno dze
column3: nna onyim hɔn adwen
column4: ntsi ɔsee nyimpa a ne nsa adwe no dɛ
column5: Soɛr gyina finimfin.  Na ɔsoɛree gyinae."

column2: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Miribisa hom asɛm
column4: Ana ɔfa mbra mu dɛ ahomgyeda wɔbɛyɛ dza oye

column2: "Na ɔhwɛɛ hɔn nyina hyiae
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Tsen wo nsa. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm
column5: na ne nsa no sanee yɛɛ mu."

column2: "Na ebufuhyew hyɛɛ hɔn nyina ma
column3: na wotutuu egyina wɔ adze a wɔdze bɛyɛ Jesus ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu no
column3: ɔkɔr koko bi do kɔsɔree; na ɔsɔɔr anafua no nyina bɔɔ mpaa kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: ɔfrɛɛ n'esuafo no
column4: na ɔpaa hɔn mu duebien a ɔfrɛɛ hɔn asomafo no."

column2: "Simon a ɔtoo no Peter
column3: nye no nua Andrew
column4: James
column11: Simon a wɔfrɛ no Zealot no
column14: nye Judas Iskariot a oyii no mae no."

column2: "Na ɔnye hɔn sianee begyinaa beebi a hɔ taa
column3: nye n'esuafo kuw kɛse no nye ɔman no mu nyimpadodow pii a wofi Judea nyina
column4: Jerusalɛm
column5: Taere nye Sidon mpoano a wɔbae betsiee no no

column2: "na hɔn a esunsum fi rehaw hɔn no
column3: na ɔsaa hɔn nyina yarba."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no nyina hwehwɛɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsa bɛka no
column3: osiandɛ tum fii no mu bae bɛsaa hɔn nyina yarba."

column2: "Na ɔmaa n'enyi do wɔ n'esuafo no do
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nhyira aka hom ehiafo
column5: na hom na Nyankopɔn ahenman no yɛ hom dze."

column2: "Nhyira aka hom a ɔkɔm dze hom sesei yi
column3: na wɔbɛma hom amee. Nhyira aka hom a hom rusu sesei yi
column4: na hom bɛserew."

column2: "Nhyira aka hom ber a nyimpa bekyir hom
column3: na woeyi hom edzi efi mu
column4: na wɔayaw hom
column5: na wɔatow hom dzin akyen dɛ dzin bɔn wɔ nyimpa Ba no ntsi."

column2: "Da no hom ndzi dɛw
column3: na hom ndzi ehurusi: na hwɛ
column4: hom akatua so wɔ sor: na dɛmara na hɔn egyanom dze yɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no."

column2: "Na hom ahonyafo
column3: hom ndue! Osiandɛ hom enya hom awerɛkyekyer dada."

column2: "Hom a hom amee sesei yi
column3: hom ndue! Na ɔkɔm bɛdze hom. Hom a hom serew sesei yi
column4: hom ndue! Na hom bedzi nkɔmbɔ na hom esu."

column2: "Aber a nyimpa nyina ka hom ho asɛm pa no
column3: hom ndue! Na dɛmara na hɔn egyanom yɛe maa nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo no."

column2: "Na meka kyerɛ hom a hom ritsie yi dɛ
column3: Hom ndɔ hom atamfo
column4: hom nyɛ hɔn a wɔtan hom yie
column7: na hom nsɔr mma hɔn a wɔbɔ hom adapaa."

column2: "Na nyia ɔbɔ w'aso fakor mu no
column3: dan fakor so ma no; na nyia ɔfa wo nkatado no
column4: mma nnsiw no w'asetar ho kwan."

column2: "Obiara a ɔserɛ wo no
column3: ma no; na nyia ɔfa w'adze no
column4: mma mmbisa no bio."

column2: "Na dza hom pɛ dɛ nyimpa yɛ ma hom no
column3: hom so nyɛ dɛmara mma hɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dɔ hɔn a wɔdɔ hom a
column3: ebɛn ndaase na hom nya? Na ndzebɔnyɛfo mpo dɔ hɔn a wɔdɔ hɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ hom yɛ yie ma hɔn a wɔyɛ hom yie a
column3: ebɛn ndaase na hom nya? Na ndzebɔnyɛfo so yɛ dɛmara."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dze fɛm hɔn a hom enyi da do dɛ hom nsa bɛka efi hɔn hɔ bio a
column3: ebɛn ndaase na hom nya? Ndzebɔnyɛfo so dze fɛm ndzebɔnyɛfo dɛ hɔn nsa bɛka no bio."

column2: "Na mbom hom ndɔ hom atamfo
column3: hom nyɛ papa
column4: na hom mfa mfɛm dɛ hom enyi nnda biribi do
column6: na hom ayɛ nyia ɔwɔ sorsor no ne mba
column8: ɔyɛ adɔyɛ ma etsiafo nye emumuyɛfo."

column2: "Hom nyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom Egya so yɛ mbɔbɔrhunyi no."

column2: "Mma hom mmbu atsɛn
column3: na wonnkobu hom atsɛn; mma hom mmbu fɔ
column4: na wonnkobu hom fɔ; hom mfa nkyɛ

column2: "hom mma
column3: na wɔama hom: esusudze pa a wɔahohom do na wɔawosow no ma ebu do na wɔdze bogu hom bo mu; na esusudze kor a hom dze susu no
column4: wɔdze bosusu ama hom bio."

column2: "Na obuu hɔn bɛ so dɛ
column3: Ana onyifurafo botum akyerɛ onyifurafo kwan? Hɔn beenu nyina nnkɔtɔ mona mu anaa?"

column2: "Osuanyi nnkyɛn ne kyerɛkyerɛfo
column3: na obiara a oedzi mu no bɛyɛ dɛ ne kyerɛkyerɛfo."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na ehwɛ duaba a ɔwɔ wo nua enyiwa mu
column3: na ennhwɛ mpuna a ɔwɔ woara w'enyiwa mu no?"

column2: "Anaadɛ ebɛyɛ dɛn etum ase wo nua dɛ
column3: Onua
column4: ma minyi duaba a ɔwɔ w'enyiwa mu
column5: na wankasa w'enyiwa mu mpuna dze innhu? Ɔwo dabrabanyi
column6: dzi kan yi mpuna fi wankasa w'enyiwa mu: nna ibohu no yie eyi duaba a ɔwɔ wo nua enyiwa mu no."

column2: "Dua pa biara nnyi hɔ a ɔsow aba prɔwee na dua prɔwee so nnyi hɔ a ɔsow aba pa."
"Na dua biara wɔdze n'aba hu no. Na nyimpa nntsetsew adɔmba wɔ nsoɛ do
column3: na eso wɔnntsetsew wenyinaba wɔ kɔkrɔw do."

column2: "Nyimpa pa fi n'akoma mu ndzepa korabea na oyi adze pa pue
column3: na nyimpa bɔn fi ne ndzɛmba bɔn korabea na oyi dza omuo pue: na ofi dza abor do wɔ akoma mu no na ano ka."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na hom frɛ me Ewuradze
column3: Ewuradze
column4: naaso hom nnyɛ dza mese?"

column2: "Obiara a ɔba mo hɔ
column3: na otsie m'asɛm
column4: na ɔyɛ no
column5: mebɛkyerɛ hom nyia ɔnye no sɛ:"

column2: "ɔtse dɛ nyimpa a osii dan
column3: na otui ma ɔdɔe
column4: na ɔtoo fapem wɔ ɔbotan do; na nsu yirii no

column2: "Na nyia otsie na ɔnnyɛ no
column3: ɔtse dɛ nyimpa a osii dan wɔ asaase enyi
column4: na onnyi fapem; ɔno na nsu yirii faa ho no
